What it is: Disrupts repetitive thought patterns rooted in existential dread or meaning crises.
How to use it: Describe your recurring existential fear. Ask AI to generate pattern-breaking interpretations or counter-narratives.
What it changes: Unfreezes mental loops through cognitive novelty.

What it is: Quantifies your emotional inputs and outputs to reveal imbalance.
How to use it: Describe how you give and receive emotion daily. Ask AI to tally investments vs. returns.

What it is: Creates a personal creed based on sovereignty and self-definition.
How to use it: Describe areas where you feel externally defined. Ask AI to help you write a symbolic autonomy oath.

What it is: Shifts your subjective relationship to time by altering symbolic associations.
How to use it: Describe how you experience time in stress vs. flow. Ask AI to generate alternate metaphors and anchors.
What it changes: Improves time agency and emotional scheduling.

What it is: Removes self-limiting plotlines embedded in personal narratives.
How to use it: Describe your life story. Ask AI to identify and remove inherited or fear-based narrative constraints.

What it is: Identifies beliefs and behaviors encoded by media, norms, or education.
How to use it: Describe a moral judgment you hold. Ask AI to trace its cultural origin and critique its influence.
What it changes: Distills independent thought from cultural noise.

What it is: Creates symbolic ceremonies to transform traumatic residue.
How to use it: Describe a painful memory. Ask AI to design a symbolic ritual that reclaims meaning or restores power.

What it is: Detects where your sense of self is undefined, fluid, or externally absorbed.
How to use it: Describe where you feel vague or imitative. Ask AI to locate and solidify blurred boundaries.

What it is: Breaks down your internal moral framework to test coherence and source.
How to use it: List your top moral beliefs. Ask AI to test them for consistency and origin.
What it changes: Strengthens or replaces inherited moral scaffolding.

What it is: Reveals ways you've made yourself unseen or hard to perceive.
How to use it: Describe a context where you feel ignored. Ask AI what behavior or internal rule contributes.
What it changes: Shifts identity from camouflage to visibility.
